name: seedBREAKER - Public Beta
description:
A fast-paced "tron-like" arcade indie that will put your reflexes to the test & keep you pushing for a better score.

Inspired by classic arcade experiences and built with casual and competitive gamers in mind, seedBREAKER is a fast-paced, atmospheric and highly responsive challenge of your skill.

Now featuring cross-platform online leader-boards so you can challenge the world on any device.

Join us on Discord! Press Kit

FEATURES:

  • Cross-platform Online Leader-Boards
  • Finely Tuned Reflex Based Gameplay
  • 100% Skill Based Competition
  • Leader-Boards for High-Score, Max Combo and Max Speed
  • Procedurally Generated Levels
  • Unlockable Avatars
  • Original Musical Score Written By The Developer
  • Fully Customizable RGB Theming
  • Pro-Mode for Distraction Free Play

COMING SOON:

  • Performance Improvements
  • Compete on a New "Seed" or Level Each Day
  • More Unlockable Avatars
  • Brightness Slider
  • Custom Game Mode
  • Android Support!

BETA WARNING:
seedBREAKER is still in beta. Any progress you make in the game or coins you earn WILL BE RESET at some point.

Press Kit
